Topology

Provides graph functions like <getDiameter> or <ToZVF>

Summary
TopologyProvides graph functions like <getDiameter> or <ToZVF>
Variables
Member variables
Functions
newConstructor
getNetsReturns reference to a list of nets
getRoutersReturns a reference to a hash with all routers (router => netstring)
getRoutersInNetReturns all routers connected to a given net.
getPathReturns the Path to the topology file
getNameReturns the topology name without suffix
setGraphSets a new graph
getGraphReturns the graph
toZVFReturns topology file object created from actual graph
getGraphPropertiesReturns property hash
toXMLCreates VNUML XML file from Graph (with
_writeGraphImageWrites the graph to png file
_initTopologySets member variables.
_generateNewTopologyCalls a generator function and returns topology
_beautifyZVFReformats a topology file.
_checkZVFSyntaxChecks topology file for syntax errors
getPropertyTextReturns the comments text for a topology file as a string
_getClusteringCoefficientReturns the clustering coefficient of the graph with 2e/v*(v-1)
_getDiameterReturns diameter of Graph with dijsktra shortest path algorithm
_createGraphPropertiesCalculates all properties of a graph.
_getLeavesReturns a list of leaves of the graph
_convertToRegularEdgesSubstitutes each hyperedge of the graph with full mesh of all connected vertices

Variables

Member variables

topologyFilefile object of topology file
graphGraph::Undirected object representing topology
propertiesproperty hash
netnameshash with netnames.  (stringwithallrouternames => netname)

Functions

new

sub new

Constructor

PARAMETERS

$topologyFilefile object of topology file
$ggraph representing topology (optional)

getNets

sub getNets

Returns reference to a list of nets

getRouters

sub getRouters

Returns a reference to a hash with all routers (router => netstring)

getRoutersInNet

sub getRoutersInNet

Returns all routers connected to a given net.

PARAMETERS

$netNamename of net to get routers connected to

RETURNS

List of routers connected to the given net

getPath

sub getPath

Returns the Path to the topology file

getName

sub getName

Returns the topology name without suffix

setGraph

sub setGraph

Sets a new graph

getGraph

sub getGraph

Returns the graph

toZVF

sub toZVF

Returns topology file object created from actual graph

getGraphProperties

sub getGraphProperties

Returns property hash

toXML

sub toXML

Creates VNUML XML file from Graph (with

RETURNS

File object with xml content for VNUML TODO: call toZVF first instead of just take the stored file

_writeGraphImage

sub _writeGraphImage

Writes the graph to png file

PARAMETERS

$filename of file to store image

_initTopology

sub _initTopology

Sets member variables.

  • If topology file is empty a new graph is generated.
  • If a graph is given it is taken instead of the topology file (file will be overwritten)
  • Else a graph is created from topology file

_generateNewTopology

sub _generateNewTopology

Calls a generator function and returns topology

TODO: call _initTopology instead of new. make this a member function

PARAMETERS

$typetype of topology to be created
@argslist of arguments for the topology creation process

_beautifyZVF

sub _beautifyZVF

Reformats a topology file.

_checkZVFSyntax

sub _checkZVFSyntax

Checks topology file for syntax errors

RETURNS

1 if successfull.  Printing error message and returning 0 when detecting a syntax error

getPropertyText

sub getPropertyText

Returns the comments text for a topology file as a string

_getClusteringCoefficient

sub _getClusteringCoefficient

Returns the clustering coefficient of the graph with 2e/v*(v-1)

_getDiameter

sub _getDiameter

Returns diameter of Graph with dijsktra shortest path algorithm

_createGraphProperties

sub _createGraphProperties

Calculates all properties of a graph.  The following properties are calculated

  • number of vertices
  • number of edges
  • diameter
  • number of cycles
  • clustering coefficient
  • leaves
  • articulations

_getLeaves

sub _getLeaves

Returns a list of leaves of the graph

_convertToRegularEdges

sub _convertToRegularEdges

Substitutes each hyperedge of the graph with full mesh of all connected vertices

TODO

Return a new graph with above substitution.
